abstract: Fox broadcaster Joe Buck's call at end of Game 6 of 2011 World Series between St Louis Cardinals and Texas Rangers carries mix of nostalgia and dram; Buck's late father Jack used the same line, 'We will see you tomorrow night,' after Kirby Puckett's winning home run in 1991 World Series.
snippet: Joe Buck punctuated the Cardinals’ game-ending home run in Game 6 on Thursday with the same line his father, Jack, used to call Kirby Puckett’s winning homer in the 1991 Series.
lead_paragraph: Joe Buck punctuated the Cardinals’ game-ending home run in Game 6 on Thursday with the same line his father, Jack, used to call Kirby Puckett’s winning homer in the 1991 Series.

headline.main: Nostalgia and Drama in Buck’s Game 6 Call
headline.print_headline: Nostalgia and Drama In Buck’s Game 6 Call
headline.seo: Joe Buck’s Call at End of Game 6 Carries Mix of Nostalgia and Drama
